titles.title: I Will Rejoice And Wave My Hands

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will rejoice and wave my hands,
Giving the glory due my God.
He has been merciful to me,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And I will proclaim His love forever,
Proclaim His love forever.
In my life He has done wondrous things!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In His love I've been born again.
I will exalt His name forever and ever. Amen.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Me gozare y mecere las manos,
Dandole gloria a mi Dios,
Conmigo ha sido misericordioso.
Proclamare su amor por siempre
Proclamare su amor por siempre

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
En mi vida El ha sido maravilloso
En su amor naci otra vez.
Exaltare su nombre para siempre
Y siempre...!amen!
